title: 89/88/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 January 1989 approving a programme submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany for the livestock and meat sector in Lower Saxony and Bremen pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 January 1989
approving a programme submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany for the livestock and meat sector in Lower Saxony and Bremen pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the German text is authentic)
(89/88/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the livestock and meat sector in Lower Saxony and Bremen forwarded by the German Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 20 January 1988, concerning which additional information was supplied on 14 October 1988, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 January 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 167, 26. 6. 1987, p. 1.
